title: 小白跪求模组啊
author: wyc5418666
txt_content:
有没有1.12.2的模拟大都市、拔刀剑、匠魂及前置、星际及前置，在线等特别急
请发源地址，不想用百度云阿

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
MineColonies 模拟殖民地 https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/minecolonies
拔刀剑 Slash Blade https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/slashblade
匠魂 Tinkers' Construct https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tinkers-construct
          Mantle https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mantle
星系 GalactiCraft https://micdoodle8.com/mods/galacticraft/downloads

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 折叠 于 2020-3-5 16:12 编辑

replies.author: wyc5418666
replies.txt_content: 谢了大家，还有什么好玩的1.12.2模组么
